events.name: "Golden" Dance Lesson - Rumi
events.description: Learn Rumi's choreography for the song "Golden".

events.name: "Golden" Dance Lesson - Zoey
events.description: Learn Zoey's choreography for the song "Golden".

events.name: "Golden" Dance Lesson - Mira
events.description: Learn Mira's choreography for the song "Golden".

events.name: "Soda Pop" Dance Lesson
events.description: Learn choreography for the song "Soda Pop".

events.name: "Your Idol" Dance Lesson
events.description: Learn choreography for the song "Your Idol".

events.name: Flash Mob Event
events.description: Perform "Golden" in public.

events.name: Karaoke
events.description: Sing songs from KPop Demon Hunters.

events.name: Korean Lyrics
events.description: Learn how to sing the Korean lyrics in KPDH songs.

events.name: Maedeup Bracelet Craft
events.description: Re-create the bracelet Rumi gave to Jinu.

events.name: Norigae Craft
events.description: Create your own personal norigae inspired by the one that Zoey wears in How It's Done.

events.name: KPop Fan Shirt
events.description: Create your own Huntrix or Saja Boy fan shirt. Bring a shirt to screenprint. We'll bring the screenprinting materials.

events.name: Demon Patterns
events.description: Learn how to apply facepaint to create your own demon patterns. Leave ready to break the Honmoon.

events.name: Derpy and Sussie Painting
events.description: Create a painting featuring Derpy and Sussie inspired by the Minhwa / Jakho-do painting tradition.

events.name: Golden Painting
events.description: Create the backdrop for Golden inspired by the Irworobongdo painting tradition.

events.name: Clay Creations
events.description: Come to learn how to create Derpy out of clay or to make your own creation among friends.

events.name: Keychain Creations
events.description: Follow our KPop Demon Hunters-inspired keychain tutorial or make your own creation among friends.

events.name: Card Creations
events.description: Learn how to make the cards that Rumi and Jinu exchange or make your own creation among friends.

events.name: Sewing Creations
events.description: Learn how to make your own demon/hunter plush or make your own creation among friends.

events.name: Ramyeon Cups
events.description: Create Rumi's, Zoey's, or Mira's ramyeon cup! Come early to get your preferred cup. If supplies are plentiful, you may be able to make more than one. (Food not included.)

events.name: Light Stick Craft
events.description: Show off your favorite band by creating their light sticks!

events.name: Huntrix Weapons Craft
events.description: Gear yourself up to fight some demons with these demon hunter weapons.

events.name: Korean Cuisine: Hotteok
events.description: Learn about and create Korean cuisine.

events.name: Cookie Decorating
events.description: Create your own gingerbread demon hunter.

events.name: Korean Culture
events.description: Learn about Korean culture from faculty in the Asian Languages and Cultures department.

events.name: KPDH Speakers
events.description: Learn about the making of the movie from creators.

events.name: Animation Analysis
events.description: Join us in watching a professional animator break down the animation techniques used in KPDH

events.name: Movie Night - Group 1
events.description: Join us for a viewing of the movie KPop Demon Hunters. Commentary is allowed.

events.name: Movie Night - Group 2
events.description: Join us for a silent viewing of the movie KPop Demon Hunters.

events.name: KPDH Short
events.description: Join us for a viewing of the short inspired by the movie KPop Demon Hunters
